title: Please change Singed's particle effects

embed.description: SINGED/KAYLE/NOCTURNE - AND 0 F*CKING PARTICLES! ►5x New Dragons: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rhrDouJmGpA&list=UUkOZw6Eyzt9rK8zR5d9MEvw ►►Subscribe to Bring It In: http://bit.ly/Brofresco ● LIVESTREAM: http://www.twitch.tv/brofresco I stream EVERY SUNDAY at 5PM CET! STALK ME! EXTRA-FRESCO: ● Snapchat: brofresco ● Twitter: https://twitter.com/Brofresco ● Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/brofresco ● Facebook: http://www.fb.com/brofrescoyt ● Instagram: http://instagram.com/brofresco ● 2nd Youtube: http://bit.ly/BrofrescoGames

body:
I'll make this short and sweet. This video has a good point. I would like to request that they at least update Singed's particle effects for this new skin. I am going to buy the skin, but can you please grant me my request? 

What would I like? Anything new or fitting to the theme. Black? Brown? 

The reference can be found in the link above.

replies.body:
Hey! 

For this particular skin, we don't have plans to add new particles. Sorry! D:

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HxuXIHah,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-20T18:27:44.353+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> For this particular skin, we don't have plans to add new particles. Sorry! D:

Katey, please reconsider that price point. This skin has the makings of an absolute masterpiece; you just need to give it what it deserves. An upgrade to a 1350 tier, with new particles and the like, is definitely warranted. Let the concept live up to its potential.

> [{quoted}](name=DoctorInju,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HxuXIHah,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2016-04-20T18:58:40.146+0000)
>
> Katey, please reconsider that price point. This skin has the makings of an absolute masterpiece; you just need to give it what it deserves. An upgrade to a 1350 tier, with new particles and the like, is definitely warranted. Let the concept live up to its potential.

I for one have to agree with this. Having a particle effect that matches the theme would be wonderful. This new looks is amazing, why not go all out?
This skin definitely deserves new particle effects, please reconsider! I couldn't believe they were 750 RP when I found out.

Speaking of partical changes, could you speed up the rate at which his poison trail appears?  I've been seeing some singed players doubletapping the button to make lots of invisible clouds with nothing to show whats poisoning you.
It's a 750 RP skin, don't hold your breath.

> [{quoted}](name=Forbidden Siren,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HxuXIHah,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-20T16:28:01.658+0000)
>
> It's a 750 RP skin, don't hold your breath.

It's _currently_ a 750 skin. They have time to make new particle effects if they wanted to.
I would personally love this skin to be 975 with a new recall and particles. I would think a smoky black cloud, with his goop being a reddish black liquid.
They never do that with any of the past 750 RP skins. Unless you found one that I don't know, please do tell. Otherwise, it's a lost cause for them to go and update it because it's a 750 skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Forbidden Siren,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HxuXIHah,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-20T16:36:29.903+0000)
>
> They never do that with any of the past 750 RP skins. Unless you found one that I don't know, please do tell. Otherwise, it's a lost cause for them to go and update it because it's a 750 skin.

Then I guess I'd settle for paying 975. For me the idea is to get something enjoyable so I wouldn't mind paying a bit more if it looks great.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HxuXIHah,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-20T16:30:54.104+0000)
>
> It's _currently_ a 750 skin. They have time to make new particle effects if they wanted to.
> I would personally love this skin to be 975 with a new recall and particles. I would think a smoky black cloud, with his goop being a reddish black liquid.

Yeah Exactly. I would love that.
750 RP Skins are strictly base model updates.
